name: 彭睿棠
objective:
照明設計基本原理之介紹為 ' 照明設計 ' 之基礎先修課程。以期學生能獲得照明設計之正確觀點與知識，內容含燈具與光源之關係，光的材料特性與色彩，測光法與光源資料之解釋，以及照明對人生生理與心理上的影響.
Course Title:Design of Lighting Description:This course is designed for one-semester program in the lighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lightion equipements. lighting design, transmission system, and distribution system) and how to maintain these equipments.
